frontmatter.title: FSA Leaders Camp 2013
frontmatter.description: Firefox Student Ambassadors (FSA) are college students who share the same passion in Mozillaâ€™s mission in building a better internet. They are one of the most important contributors of Mozilla, by inspiring and educating students like them and even adults that they can make the web a better place for the benefit of all web users. They are the next generation leaders and Web innovators.
